thread.title: L.I.F.T. Studio
thread.title_full: Culinary Depot reviewed by L.I.F.T. Studio

author: L.I.F.T. Studio
title: L.I.F.T. Studio
text: Working with Culinary Depot was great. Ordering and delivery went very smooth. My only concern is that if we don't scrub the sink daily, we end up with little bits of rust forming on the bottom of the basin. However having said that, it was an extremely affordable stainless sink and we really like it!
